note.p: Career: Made a fortune in India (late 18th century)
Freemason, made one on 26 April 1802, Somerset House Lodge No 2, subsequently Royal Somerset House and Inverness Lodge No 4, London
Library and Museum of Freemasonry, 'Freemasons and the Royal Society; Alphabetical List of Fellows of the Royal Society who were Freemasons' London, 2010, page 23
